summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor and the City Comptroller to draw a warrant on the Water Fund in favor of C. A. Goddard, also a warrant in favor of L. I. D. No. 764, for the purpose of correcting assessment levied for the improvement of Ewing Street et al, by laying water mains therein, provided for in Ordinance No. 9635 creating Local Improvement District No. 764, and appropriating money therefor.
